company.tagline: Maximize video & images with AI search and automated metadata
company.description: Coactive is an AI-driven platform that optimizes video and image content through automated metadata. It enables dynamic tagging, enhances content workflows, and provides powerful tools for content discovery and monetization.

funding_rounds.source: Coactive AI Series B Funding Round
